main_definition: An infant is a very young child, typically under one year old.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of age and growth stage
meanings_and_examples.example: The baby was an infant, barely able to sit up on his own.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In computing, 'infant' refers to a primitive or early version of something.
meanings_and_examples.example: After much experimentation, the developers released the infant software for beta testing.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic expression meaning someone who is naive or inexperienced
meanings_and_examples.example: As an infant to the world of investing, he lost a significant amount of money on his first venture.
